# Test

## Learning outcomes

By the end of this module, you are expected to have:

* Installed R.
* Installed RStudio.
<!-- * Installed Git. -->
* Tested R and RStudio. <!--  and Git. -->
* Installed some packages.

The learning outcomes relate to the [overall learning goal](#lg-course) number 5 of the course.
